CustomField.description: Goal is prorated by 25% if cleansing program checkbox on the account page isnt true or Companies Cleansed isnt an additional guarantee, % to Appt Goal Actual is at least 100%
CustomField.formula: IF (AND (OR( Cleansing_Program__c = False, NOT(INCLUDES(Additional_Guarantees__c,"Companies Cleansed"))), to_Appt_Goal_Actual__c >= 1), Monthly_Companies_Qualified_Goal__c *(75/100),Monthly_Companies_Qualified_Goal__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Goal is prorated by 25% if cleansing program checkbox on the account page isnt true or Companies Cleansed isnt an additional guarantee, % to Appt Goal Actual is at least 100%
CustomField.label: Companies Qualified Goal Formula
